message.content:
{"id": "4329", 
"title": "Search results not displayed when searching via Package view selection and dialog", 
"description": "When searching via the Package view selection and dialog on the system with ID 1GLDN1X, no results are displayed. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly. The issue seems to be that the Search dialog in the package view initializes with the fully qualified name, which is not found when searching for declarations. The expected behavior is that the search should first attempt to get the Java element and if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.", 
"OB": "The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name, causing no results to be displayed when searching for declarations. Search functionality via the context menu in packages view, however, works correctly.",
"EB": "The Search dialog in the package view should be modified to initialize with the element name instead of the fully qualified name when performing a search for declarations. This will ensure that the search results are displayed correctly.",
"SR": "1. Modify the package view search functionality to initialize the Search dialog with the element name instead of the fully qualified name.\n2. Update the search algorithm to first attempt to get the Java element and only display the fully qualified name if getting the element fails."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '4329', 'title': 'Bug 4329No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)', 'description': 'Bug 4329No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X) ', 'OB': 'The package view initializes the Search dialog with thefully qualified name. This is not found when searchingfor declarations.Search via context menu in packages view works.== (Java) Search should first try to get the Java element and ifthat fails, display the the element name and not the fully qualifiedname.NOTES: ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
